title: The young divines apologie for his continuance in the Vniuersitie with certaine meditations, ritten by Nathaniel Povvnoll, late student of Christ-Church in Oxford.
author: Pownall, Nathaniel, 1583 or 4-1610.
publicationDate: 1612 And are to be sold in Pauls Churchyard: by Matthevv Lovvnes at the signe of the Bishops head.
publisher: Printed by Cantrell Legge printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge,
notes: Some print show-through; pages 14 and 84-5 stained. Pages 74-95 from the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge) Library spliced at end.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
